title: Morning Routine
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Hey Karin, I saw your vlog! It was awesome!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>I need to learn from your morning routine, Karin.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Waking up refreshed in the morning, followed by stretching while drinking some herbal tea. Cleaning your room and doing laundry while listening to music. Then have bread, eggs, and vegetable soup for breakfast.... You’re living the dream~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Y-.... you think so?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You also made sandwiches for lunch, right? And despite all that, you’re still the first one to morning practice. It’s truly amazing.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Umm.... You see....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It was such a good video, but why didn’t you show your face?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Yeah, that was a shame. I’m looking forward to your next vlog.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>(I need to say it.... that it was Emma’s.... Ugh, but it’s getting harder and harder~~)<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
